Choice.Tooltip: Displays the percentage of different tautomers present at the given pH.
Calculates only the canonical tautomer of the structure.
Used for the identification of tautomers in JChem databases. Please see details in the help.
Gives the first species from the dominant tautomer distribution.
Calculates all possible tautomers. If any deuterium or tritium is involved in the tautomerization, it moves during enumeration.

Number.Label: Max. number of structures
Number.Tooltip: Maximizes the number of structures to display.

Boolean.Label: Consider pH effect
Boolean.Tooltip: Takes into account the protonation states at given pH. Applicable for Major tautomer and Dominant tautomer distribution calculations.

Boolean.Label: Set max. allowed length of the tautomerization path
Boolean.Tooltip: Sets the number of bonds which are considered by displacing a double bond.

Boolean.Label: Protect aromaticity
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, the aromaticity will be maintained.

Boolean.Label: Protect charge
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, defined charged atoms maintain their charge during calculation.

Boolean.Label: Exclude antiaromatic compounds
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, any tautomer structure having an antiaromatic ring system will be discarded.

Boolean.Label: Protect double bond stereo
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, all double bonds with stereo information remain intact. If unchecked, tautomer regions will lose the double bond stereo information, any other stereo information in the molecule is kept intact.

Boolean.Label: Protect all tetrahedral stereo centers
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, stereocenters are not included in the tautomerization. If unchecked, tautomer regions will lose the tetrahedral stereo information, any other stereo information in the molecule is kept intact.

Boolean.Label: Protect labeled tetrahedral stereo centers only
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, stereocenters labeled with chiral flag or MDL Enhanced Stereo Represenation flags will not be included in tautomerization, other stereocenters will.

Boolean.Label: Protect ester groups
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, the ester groups will be excluded form the tautomerization.

Boolean.Label: Ring-chain tautomerization is allowed
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, ring-chain tautomers will also be generated.

Boolean.Label: Single fragment mode
Boolean.Tooltip: If checked, the results are displayed in separate windows, if unchecked, the calculation handles unlinked molecules together and results are in the same window.
